page.title: 17OUTDOOR INTERESTS
page.content: Sport is a major interest. There are 2 public tennis courts. The football club has a good ground and plays regular matches. The school has a small sports field including jumping pits. The childrens recreation ground has swings, slide and roundabout. There are regular trips to Swindon and Marlborough for swimming. Golfers go to Ogbourne or Marlborough. There is some shooting at clays and vermin. Walking often with children and dogs is popular either on local paths or after a car journey to areas where there are country parks or open down- land. Most houses have gardens and this provides interest, exercise and food. This and the weather provide a constant source of conversation. Front gardens, flower baskets and tubs give pleasure to visitors and enjoyable competition between neighbours
